definitions.body: [[טוֹבִיׇּהוּ]] a Levite, assigned to reign of Jehoshaphat 2Ch 17:8, not LXX; LXXL Twbiav, elsewhere [[טוֹבִיׇּה]] LXX Twbia(v).
Ammonite adversary of Nehem. Ne 2:10, Ne 2:19, Ne 3:35, Ne 4:1, Ne 6:1, Ne 6:12, Ne 6:14, Ne 6:17, Ne 6:17, Ne 6:19, Ne 13:4, Ne 13:7, Ne 13:8.
head of a family of returning exiles of doubtful lineage Ezr 2:60 = Ne 7:62.
a chief of returning exiles Zec 6:10, Zec 6:14, LXX xrhsi/mwn (-moiv) au)th=v, i.e. [[טוֹבֶיהָ]].
